title: Accessibility
subtitle: Ten10 is committed to providing an accessible user experience for all users

visual.title: Visual Support
visual.description: The application supports users with visual difficulties:
visual.item1: High color contrast in dark and light modes
visual.item3: Clear labels for all input fields and buttons

keyboard.title: Keyboard Navigation
keyboard.description: All functions can be operated using a keyboard:
keyboard.item1: Navigate between fields with Tab and Shift+Tab
keyboard.item2: Activate buttons with Enter or Spacebar
keyboard.item3: Close windows and modals with Esc

screenReaders.title: Screen Readers
screenReaders.description: The application is compatible with screen readers:
screenReaders.item1: Appropriate ARIA labels for all interactive elements
screenReaders.item3: Logical and consistent navigation between elements

navigation.title: Navigation and RTL
navigation.description: The application supports full Hebrew support with RTL (right-to-left) layout, and English support with LTR (left-to-right) layout. Navigation automatically adapts to text direction.

standards.title: Accessibility Standards
standards.description: We are committed to meeting the following accessibility standards:
standards.item1: WCAG 2.1 Level AA - Web Content Accessibility Guidelines
standards.item3: Equal Rights for Persons with Disabilities Law (Israel)
standards.item4: Support for various devices (computer, tablet, phone) and leading browsers

coordinator.title: Accessibility Inquiries
coordinator.description: For accessibility inquiries, please contact us:
coordinator.alternative: Alternatively, you can use the contact form within the application.

audit.title: Accessibility Statement
audit.lastUpdated: This accessibility statement was last updated: January 2026
audit.description: We conduct regular accessibility audits and continuously improve accessibility. Our user interface is built on Radix UI library which provides built-in accessibility support.

knownIssues.title: Known Limitations
knownIssues.description: We are aware of some accessibility limitations that we are working to address:
knownIssues.item1: Charts and graphs may be difficult to fully interpret with screen readers
knownIssues.item2: Some data tables are complex and may require additional navigation
knownIssues.note: We continue to improve accessibility and welcome feedback and suggestions.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: If you encounter an accessibility issue or have suggestions for improvement, please contact us:
